execSnapshot: Carried-forward: Amazon PSA under contract; non-refundable milestone still targeted for March 2026.
Block 2 Retail capital stack nearing finalization pending anchor confirmation.
Del Via lease-up continues with concessions supporting absorption.

summary: Amazon diligence remains the primary near-term milestone; closing targeted for mid-2026.
Retail and multifamily workstreams continue in lockstep; focus on anchor confirmation and absorption.
Permitting cadence remains aligned to support rapid mobilization.
details: Amazon: PSA active; diligence and plan review ongoing; non-refundable still aimed for March 2026.
Land: Additional 25-acre LOI remains in negotiation for distribution use.
Retail: Block 2 shovel-ready; anchor and inline prospects engaged; lender prepared to close pending leasing.
Retail Core: Permitting on track with April 2026 target.
Del Via: Lease-up progressing with concessions; retail activation expected to aid velocity.

landSales.title: Amazon Land Sale
commentary: Diligence and city review continue; tracking to non-refundable and closing targets.
LOI expansion remains additive to monetization potential.

visuals.caption: Acreage under contract and adjacent LOI parcel.

statusSnapshot.title: Status Snapshot
items: Capital: Equity raise advancing with two groups

commentary: Anchor confirmation is the gating item for immediate closing on the capital stack.
Inline negotiations progress in parallel to bolster pre-leasing coverage.

statusSnapshot.title: Metrics Snapshot
items: Status: Lease-up continues; retail activation expected to aid absorption

commentary: Concessions remain elevated while absorption builds momentum.
Retail activation remains the key support for velocity and stabilization.

risks: Capital stack timing linked to anchor confirmation.
